body:
YO YO YOOOO
Just wanted to let you all know I stepped down from my Administrator position to a Moderator. I will not disclose why, but I plan to release that sometime soon. 

Thanks everyone for your support, even though it's been a bumpy ride. I will work just as hard as a Moderator, and I'm sure it'll be fun! 
My replacement is due soon.

Thanks once again,
Fluenza,
Former Staff Administrator.
body_tagged:
YO YO YOOOO

Thanks everyone for your support, even though it's been a bumpy ride. I will work just as hard as a Moderator, and I'm sure it'll be fun! 
My replacement is due soon.

Thanks once again,
Fluenza,
Former Staff Administrator.
title: Stepping down

replies.body: I'll miss you. *Sobs in our call again*

replies.body_tagged: You've done amazingly as a staff administrator and I'm sure we'll see just as good from you as a moderator! c:

replies.body: You did an amazing job as the staff director Jozz, welcome to the mod team :) You'll be just as great!
replies.body_tagged: You did an amazing job as the staff director Jozz, welcome to the mod team :) You'll be just as great!

replies.body:
Words can't even describe how much you mean to me, Joel. You were there as a Moderator, alongside me. You were there with me as a Senior Moderator while I was still a rank below you, and somehow after how long we've been here together, you stayed next to me.

The fact that you supported me in becoming Gill's successor, showing me the ropes, the ups and the downs, etc. How late at night we'd stay up just so we could talk.. You mean so much to me, Joel. You have never left my side before, and let's hope that day never comes. 

At this point in time, Joel, I can truthfully say that you are my best friend. I cherish everything you've helped me through, and everything we've done. I'll never forget it.

Take care, -Jake
replies.body_tagged:
Words can't even describe how much you mean to me, Joel. You were there as a Moderator, alongside me. You were there with me as a Senior Moderator while I was still a rank below you, and somehow after how long we've been here together, you stayed next to me.

The fact that you supported me in becoming Gill's successor, showing me the ropes, the ups and the downs, etc. How late at night we'd stay up just so we could talk.. You mean so much to me, Joel. You have never left my side before, and let's hope that day never comes. 

At this point in time, Joel, I can truthfully say that you are my best friend. I cherish everything you've helped me through, and everything we've done. I'll never forget it.

Take care, -Jake

replies.body:
Its certainly been the most interesting experience to see your development over the past year. From little babby junior mod jozzy to sistahood member and hard working moderator, to your days as senior moderator and finally becoming my successor. You've been an amazing role model to everyone in this community and, more importantly, a close friend.

Thank you

replies.body:
Hey jozz, you were a great Admin and you have done an exceptional job as one. It is a little saddening to see you step down, but I respect your decision and I hope you accomplish whatever you have in mind. It's going to be a great experience while working along side you, and hopefully I may be able to learn more about you and learn more from you. I look up to you, and I will continue to do so as you work alongside us all.
                                               Sincerely,
                        Frustration (kammy878)

replies.body:
I'm sorry to hear that you are stepping down from the admin position. You have done a great job as a admin to help the avicus server, and I believe you will continue doing a good job as a moderator as well.

Thank you.

replies.body: Wow, you've been an absolutely amazing Administrator, and I feel like you really connected to the community, which is the most important thing that we need in my opinion. You've done so much, and I've really enjoyed you being an Administrator in general. <3
replies.body_tagged: Wow, you've been an absolutely amazing Administrator, and I feel like you really connected to the community, which is the most important thing that we need in my opinion. You've done so much, and I've really enjoyed you being an Administrator in general. <3

replies.body:
Well, you were very busy as an admin. I guess that's why you stepped down, I know how much work you put in, but I also know your amazing care for the server as well, and I know it must have been hard for you to step down, knowing that you care so much about the server. I thought you were a good admin, personally, always trying to help others out despite your workload. Yes, you had flaws, but don't we all?  You did a great job keeping everything in check, but I guess we all need a break once in a while, assuming that's the reason you stepped down. Gl with everything and school, and thanks for all the hard work, Joel.

Good luck with all future endeavors, 

-Stimulating/ShadowSlayerZ7/Jackson

P.S. Also thanks for putting up my controversy that I'd cause that'd put you and the staff team under stress. I felt it needed to be done, but I do feel bad that I caused that kind of stress on top of your workload, so you know. Thanks for listening.
replies.body_tagged:
Well, you were very busy as an admin. I guess that's why you stepped down, I know how much work you put in, but I also know your amazing care for the server as well, and I know it must have been hard for you to step down, knowing that you care so much about the server. I thought you were a good admin, personally, always trying to help others out despite your workload. Yes, you had flaws, but don't we all?  You did a great job keeping everything in check, but I guess we all need a break once in a while, assuming that's the reason you stepped down. Gl with everything and school, and thanks for all the hard work, Joel.

Good luck with all future endeavors, 

-Stimulating/ShadowSlayerZ7/Jackson

P.S. Also thanks for putting up my controversy that I'd cause that'd put you and the staff team under stress. I felt it needed to be done, but I do feel bad that I caused that kind of stress on top of your workload, so you know. Thanks for listening.

replies.body: What's with the email support now? :c

replies.body: Thanks, Fluenza. It was nice having you as an Admin. You knew when to give punishments, you could be serious when needed, and so much more. I really appreciate you're work for the server. Let's see if your replacement will do as great as you did.
replies.body_tagged: Thanks, Fluenza. It was nice having you as an Admin. You knew when to give punishments, you could be serious when needed, and so much more. I really appreciate you're work for the server. Let's see if your replacement will do as great as you did.

replies.body: You were doing an amazing job, you shouldn't have let people get the better of you.  I am glad to hear that you will remain on staff, but seriously, you were doing an amazing job <3  Don't let other people tell you otherwise.
replies.body_tagged: You were doing an amazing job, you shouldn't have let people get the better of you.  I am glad to hear that you will remain on staff, but seriously, you were doing an amazing job <3  Don't let other people tell you otherwise.

replies.body:
Know the backlash I've caused was trying to improve the server (solving issues)/right wrongs I felt had been done (forums ban). 

Know I only wanted the best, even if I did sink my teeth in. It was only because I was frustrated/disappointed, because I knew this server could improve and be something great. Don't get me wrong, you were doing fine, better than fine tbh. You were doing great. I think the only reason there's so much community backlash, is because we all see the immense potential of the server, and are kinda sad because Avi hasn't realized it's full potential yet, and it's taking a while to get there.

Am cri evri tim :'c
Well, to be honest I never really did ever get to know you very well though I did talk to you a few times :/ It's easy to tell that you've contributed a lot to Avicus and it's because of people like you that Avivis is a better place. With all your work it's sad to see you step down but you'll always be remembered <3
